data.title: The Culture Corner: How Curtis Mayfield left an indelible mark on Chicago - WXPN
data.meta_description: Born in Chicago, Mayfield was responsible for so much music over the course of his career, from soundtracks to his work with The Impressions.
data.text:
For our Sense of Place Chicago series, we’ve been exploring the current Chicago music scene and the artists who are creating the sound of the city now.

But today, we’re going to take a look back at an artist who laid some of that groundwork that helped make Chicago a music destination.

For a special Chicago edition of the Culture Corner, World Cafe correspondent John Morrison is taking you through Curtis Mayfield’s career. You might know Mayfield as a solo artist and a member of The Impressions, but he also spent time moonlighting as a producer and songwriter for others.
